Mottram Contest 0 Test Piece Contest

Own Choice from a Specified List
Mottram in Longdendale, Greater Manchester, England, UK Promoted by Mottram and Broadbottom Brass Band March: 1. Mossley, 2. Thornsett. Best euphonium - John Carter (Mossley). Best trombone - H.Hoyland (Thornsett). 5 bands competed.
Aug. 13, 2013, 1:50 p.m. June 13, 2018, 8:48 p.m.
1 Mossley Band Alexander Owen Songs of England [Round]
2 Thornsett Christopher Smith Betley
3 New Mills Band Fred Durham Oberon [arr. Round]
4 Eccles Borough Band Alexander Owen Oberon [arr. Round]
5 St. George's Pendleton Fred Durham Songs of England [Round]
